column1: Table 17. Police protection sworn and nonsworn employment and payrolls and percent distribution of full-time equivalent employment of 49 large city governments, March 2010 (final)
Series title:  Justice Expenditure and Employment Extracts 2010, NCJ 247019
Data source:  Justice Expenditure and Employment Extracts Program (JEE)
Table 17. Police protection sworn and nonsworn employment and payrolls and percent distribution of full-time equivalent employment of 49 large city governments, March 2010 (final)
Note:  Payroll data shown here may not sum to equal police protection March payroll data in table 16 due to rounding.
Jurisdictions without data did not report for 2010.
